content:
```text
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate mine at position(-22.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill at position (-22.0, -50.0) and a chest at position (-21.5, -48.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-19.5, -49.5) and a chest at position (-17.5, -48.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-13.5, -49.5) that puts into furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Burner inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) that puts into chest at position (-14.5, -52.5)
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position (-15.0, -50.0) to assembling machine at position(-13.5, -49.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Errors when getting an entity at a position
- Ensure that the entity exists at the position before attempting to get it

# NAMESPACE
```
